meaning_str.bing:
adj. 确信；深信；坚信；坚信不移的
v. “convince”的过去分词和过去式
网络. 确信的；深信的；信服的

确信；深信；坚信；坚信不移的

深信的；确信的；坚信的；信服的；信心十足的；深信不疑的；坚信不移的
使相信；使确信；使信服；说服；劝说；（convince的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: Well, he convinced me and actually I was ready to get off the train with him after talking to him a short while.
1.cn: 他说服了我，事实上我在和他聊了一会儿以后就决定和他一块下车了，

2.en: At least one commenter was convinced the company would be OK.
2.cn: 至少有一名发表评论的用户相信苹果将不会有问题。

3.en: Of their personal charms he had not required a second interview to be convinced.
3.cn: 对于她们的妩媚动人，他无需进行第二次访问，便深信不疑。

1.en: Your mother convinced me to let her join me on my missions.
1.cn: 你妈妈当时说服了我，让她加入了我的任务。

2.en: I'm just not convinced it's the right way forward, to go backward.
2.cn: 我就是觉得走向未来不该用倒退的方式。

3.en: Secondly, that I am convinced it will add greatly to my happiness.
3.cn: 其次，我深信结婚会大大地促进我的幸福。

4.en: Gally has everyone convinced that you're the reason all this has happened.
4.cn: 盖里说服了所有人，是这都是你的错。

5.en: You know, you almost had us convinced that you were gonna change your ways.
5.cn: 你知道吗，我们差点都相信你改过自新了。

6.en: Doris Jones, her daughter's running. The congresswoman would need to be convinced.
6.cn: 桃瑞丝·琼斯，她女儿要竞选。得说服那位女议员。

7.en: A man named Jesus convinced you to build a church in Africa. You're kind of a sucker.
7.cn: 一个叫耶稣的男人让你掏钱在非洲盖了一座教堂，你就是这么好骗。

8.en: The time you put on my shirt by mistake and were convinced you'd started growing again.
8.cn: 还有那次你错穿了我的T恤，还以为自己又开始长个儿了。

9.en: You know what? You've convinced me. Maybe tonight we should sneak in and shampoo her carpet.
9.cn: 你说的对，也许今晚我们应该偷溜进去把她的地毯洗了。

10.en: But we made her believe that we did. And she convinced you. Now, wouldn't you call that blindness?
10.cn: 但我们让她以为我们做了，而她说服了你。这不叫被蒙蔽吗？

11.en: I was so convinced it was Moriarty, I couldn't see what was right under my nose. Expected a pearl.
11.cn: 我一直坚信是莫里亚蒂，我没看到眼皮底下的东西，还以为会是珍珠。

12.en: So the car's a success? Well, I wasn't convinced it would be, but it is. You must have a go sometime.
12.cn: 车不错吗？我本来不太确定，但的确不错，你哪天一定得试试。

13.en: He insisted that we couldn't open the park. We argued. I thought I had convinced him, but I was wrong.
13.cn: 他坚持不让我们开放乐园，我们吵了一架，我以为我说服了他，但我错了。

14.en: Those coffers were never depleted. You simply convinced yourself otherwise to support your own machinations.
14.cn: 他们的精神之库也不曾空过，你只不过说服了你自己，否则就无法继续你的阴谋诡计。

15.en: Yes, well, someone convinced him that you wouldn't tell the truth unless you were actually wetting yourself.
15.cn: 对了，有人劝他说，如果不好好吓唬吓唬你你是不会说实话的。

16.en: Look Rachel, I wanted to tell you, I thought I should, I did, and then Chandler and Joey convinced me not to.
16.cn: 瑞秋，我早就想告诉你，我觉得我应该告诉你，但是钱德和乔伊叫我不要说。

17.en: We don't make enough fun of you already? Oh yeah, Emily convinced me to do it. You do know that Wham broke up?
17.cn: 我们笑你笑得还不够吗？艾蜜莉说服我去穿的。你知道威猛乐队解散了吧？

18.en: That whole love-crazed, besotted schoolgirl routine. Impressive. Truly. You convinced the people in The Capitol.
18.cn: 那一副被爱冲昏头脑的小女生模样，让人刮目相看，真的，国会区居民对你深信不疑。

19.en: So...Says you. ...you're convinced the underlying mortgages in these bonds are solid loans. That is our opinion, yes.
19.cn: 那么… 口说无凭。你确信这些债券对应的房贷是可靠的吗？根据我们公司的观点，是的。
